Articles.Content: I read about a mod a few days ago that you could use to slow time so you could launch much bigger ships without terrible lag? I'm sure it was called omega12, but I can't seem to find it anywhere. Any help would be great, also I'm sorry if this is the second time I've posited this thread as my Internet messed up just as I was posting it. Thanks.
I think its in the spacecraft exchange. I saw it too.

Found it! I'd read it in this Reddit post http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/10qlhy/apollo_moon_mission_recreated_in_ksp_using_stock/

and heres the file

https://www.dropbox.com/s/4t9fjtxsszu3ryl/Omega12.zip
